description: Returns a list of the groups that the specified canary is associated with. The canary that you specify must be in the current Region.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the canary that you want to view groups for.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain information about the groups that this canary is associated with.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates that there is more data available. You can use this token in a subsequent ListAssociatedGroups operation to retrieve the next set of results.
